textContent:
We want the same thing 

I want to feel loved and appreciated and interesting and the most important person I. The world and so do you

I want and need to be believed in bc this path is hard and I want to know you're all in it with me

I need to create, to bring into the world what is in me and I need someone who views this as beautiful and valuable and is going to be supportive of it, not making it into an either or

I feel like it's either I do the thing or I'm loving you. And when I'm in my power there is no room for you. I want someone who doesn't need to have the reassurance and affirmations that I'm there. That's willing to trust I'm all in it with them too 

In my view of the world 
In your view of the world 
In our view of the world 
In our family 
In the everyday
title: Reflections
textContentHtml:
We want the same thing 


I want to feel loved and appreciated and interesting and the most important person I. The world and so do you


I want and need to be believed in bc this path is hard and I want to know you're all in it with me


I need to create, to bring into the world what is in me and I need someone who views this as beautiful and valuable and is going to be supportive of it, not making it into an either or


I feel like it's either I do the thing or I'm loving you. And when I'm in my power there is no room for you. I want someone who doesn't need to have the reassurance and affirmations that I'm there. That's willing to trust I'm all in it with them too 


In my view of the world 

In your view of the world 

In our view of the world 

In our family 

In the everyday
